alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Laurens, southeastern Greenville and east central Anderson Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Greenville Downtown, or 5 miles south of Donaldson Center, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Piedmont and Fork Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
